name: verbumtv
0: ”Alexa, open my sri lankan catholic t. v.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my sri lankan catholic t. v.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Dedicated to make Christ and His teachings more intimate and dear in thoughts, words and deeds Of our beloved people, and to reach out & speak out to the heart of today’s society through the love of Christ, enhancing the faith and moral values of the Roman Catholic population, enriching the lives of people and help uplift the society is the foe-most agenda of Verbum TV.
Verbum TV programing is broadcasted in English, Sinhalese and Tamil Languages.

Please note that once the skill is invoked, it could take upto 20 seconds for the stream to play.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
